amendment.description: Page 166, insert after line 3 the following new section: \ SEC. 647. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the economic embargo of Cuba, as defined in section 4(7) of the Cuban Liberty and Democratic Solidarity (LIBERTAD) Act of 1996 (Public Law 104-114), except that the foregoing limitation does not apply to the administration of a tax or tariff.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert the following new section on page 166 after line 3: Sec. 647. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the economic embargo of Cuba, as defined in section 4(7) of the Cuban Liberty and Deomcratic Solidarity (LIBERTAD) Act of 1996 (Public Law 104-114), except that the foregoing limitation does not apply to the administration of a tax tariff.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 225 (Roll no. 461).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Rangel.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 225 (Roll no. 461).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
